results.title: METNET: a phase II trial of metformin in patients with well-differentiated neuroendocrine tumours
results.text_hl: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ monotherapy in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with advanced/metastatic well-differentiated @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@NET@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Leukemia_Lymphocytic_Chronic_B_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015451 @@@WD-NET@@@) of gastroenteropancreatic (GEP) or pulmonary origin.

citations.NLM: Glasberg J, Talans A, Giollo TR, Recchimuzzi DZ, Neto JEB, Lopez RVM, Hoff PMG, Riechelmann RP. METNET: a phase II trial of metformin in patients with well-differentiated neuroendocrine tumours Ecancermedicalscience. 2022;16():1369. PMID: 35685961

results.title: Metformin and Thymoquinone Synergistically Inhibit Proliferation of Imatinib-Resistant Human Leukemic Cells
results.text_hl: Combinatorial therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Dasatinib @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069439 @@@dasatinib@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Leukemia_Lymphocytic_Chronic_B_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015451 @@@chronic lymphocytic leukemia@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Leukemia_Lymphocytic_Chronic_B_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015451 @@@CLL@@@) is one of the promising approaches.

citations.NLM: Glamoclija U, Mahmutovic L, Bilajac E, Soljic V, Vukojevic K, Suljagic M. Metformin and Thymoquinone Synergistically Inhibit Proliferation of Imatinib-Resistant Human Leukemic Cells Front Pharmacol. 2022;13():867133. PMID: 35496297

results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ promotes cytotoxicity in B @DISEASE_Leukemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007938 @@@leukemic@@@ cell lines and in primary @<m>DISEASE_Leukemia_Lymphocytic_Chronic_B_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015451 @@@B-CLL@@@ cells

results.title: In Silico Modeling-based Identification of Glucose Transporter 4 (GLUT4)-selective Inhibitors for Cancer Therapy.
results.text_hl: @GENE_SLC2A4 @GENE_6517 @@@GLUT4@@@ inhibition also caused sensitization to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @DISEASE_Multiple_Myeloma @DISEASE_MESH:D009101 @@@multiple myeloma@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Leukemia_Lymphocytic_Chronic_B_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015451 @@@chronic lymphocytic leukemia@@@ and a number of solid @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumors@@@ suggesting the broader therapeutic utility of targeting @GENE_SLC2A4 @GENE_6517 @@@GLUT4@@@.
